aboutMe.introMain: Hi, I'm Benjamin. A few years ago, I discovered the possibilities and challenges of software development and became increasingly engaged with it until the passion truly ignited and now I can't imagine doing anything else professionally. I'm eager to learn, hardworking, and I love diving into new technologies.
aboutMe.introOne: I'm based in Schoeningen, located near Braunschweig / Wolfsburg / Magdeburg. I'm very open to remote work and comfortable with commutes when needed. Relocation isn't currently planned.
aboutMe.introTwo: I love learning new technologies and can quickly get up to speed with new tools and frameworks. I also find AI fascinating, integrating it into products in a practical and meaningful way.
aboutMe.introThree: To solve problems, I work in a structured way: first understand the problem, work out solution approaches, then implement a clean solution. I care about readability, performance, and a great user experience. I find great joy in contributing to a team and helping each other grow.

skills.mainText: Frontend development changes fast, and I keep up by staying consistent: I invest a lot of time, practice regularly and refine my skills step by step. I enjoy learning new techniques and tools and applying them in real projects.
skills.requestText: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
skills.interest:
I have a special
interest in learning

projects.headline: Featured Projects
projects.intro:
Explore a selection of my work here. Interact with
projects to see my skills in action.
projects.question: What is this project about?

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

polloLoco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy boss hen.

pokedex.description: Based on the Pok√©API a simple library that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

references.headline: What my colleagues say about me

janisch.text: Benjamin has proven to be a reliable group partner. His technical skills and proactive approach were crucial to the success of our project.

fischer.text: I had the good fortune of working with Benjamin in a group project at the Developer Akademie that involved a lot of effort. He always stayed calm, cool and focused and made sure our team was set up for success. He is super knowledgeable, easy to work with and I would happily work with him again given the chance.

schulz.text: Our project benefited enormously from Benjamins efficient way of working.

weber.text: Working with Benjamin was a great experience. His problem-solving skills are exceptional.

contact.headline: Let's work together
contact.question: Got a problem to solve?
contact.text:
I enjoy building modern UIs with attention to detail from layout to performance.

If you need a Frontend developer who ships reliably, Let's talk!

legalNotice.headline: Legal Notice
legalNotice.acceptanceText: By accessing and using Portfolio (Product), you acknowledge and agree to the following terms and conditions, and any policies, guidelines, or amendments thereto that may be presented to you from time to time. We, the listed students, may update or change the terms and conditions from time to time without notice.
legalNotice.scope: Scope and ownership of the product
legalNotice.scopeText:
Portfolio has been developed as part of a student group project in a web development bootcamp at the Developer Akademie GmbH. It has an educational purpose and is not intended for extensive personal & business usage. As such, we cannot guarantee consistent availability, reliability, accuracy, or any other aspect of quality regarding this Product.

The design of Portfolio is owned by the Developer Akademie GmbH. Unauthorized use, reproduction, modification, distribution, or replication of the design is strictly prohibited.
legalNotice.rightsText: Aside from the design owned by Developer Akademie GmbH, we, the listed students, retain all proprietary rights in Portfolio, including any associated copyrighted material, trademarks, and other proprietary information.
legalNotice.useText: Portfolio is intended to be used for lawful purposes only, in accordance with all applicable laws and regulations. Any use of Portfolio for illegal activities, or to harass, harm, threaten, or intimidate another person, is strictly prohibited. You are solely responsible for your interactions with other users of Portfolio.
legalNotice.disclaimer: Disclaimer of warranties and limitation of liability
legalNotice.disclaimerText: Portfolio is provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind, whether express or implied, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. In no event will we, the listed students, or the Developer Akademie, be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages, including but not limited to, damages for loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages, arising out of or in connection with the use or performance of Portfolio.
legalNotice.indemnityText: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless us, the listed students, the Developer Akademie, and our affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, and employees, from and against any claim, demand, loss, damage, cost, or liability (including reasonable legal fees) arising out of or relating to your use of Portfolio and/or your breach of this Legal Notice.
